Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR is followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR occurring in variants that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that directly precedes Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR without intermediate rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that result in successful payment (i.e., end with Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across all cases, to support the goal of reducing rejections by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of total activity executions in the log that correspond to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR is missing despite Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE being present, indicating potential bypass or process deviation
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases where 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' does not happen

Name: Average number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR occurrences per case in variants that reach Payment Handled
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR appears in process variants that do not contain any rejection activity
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR compared to the frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR events per year to assess temporal trends
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that occurs after Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION versus after Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in variants that include at least one rejection by any role
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR events that are part of cycles involving resubmission after rejection
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR out of all approval-related activities (including Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER, Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER']"}"
